instruction.value: DAY 1 of 21 day cycle. Administer dose diluted in 250 mL sodium chloride 0.9%. Administer dose over 90 minutes ans observe patient for 90 minutes post-infusion. If well tolerated, subsequent infusions may be administered over 30 minutes with patient observed for 30 minutes post-infusion.

AdditionalNotes.value: trastuzumab emtansine (Kadcyla) is not interchangeable with trastuzumab (Herceptin).
